casebody.data:
FORBIS, et al.
v.
NEAL. No. 79PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 14, 2006. Eugene C. Hicks, III, Charlotte, for Forbis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of June 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Beverly Neal) shall have up to and including the 7th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of June 2006."
